title.rendered: WIN! Spring Fling- Fashion Previews and Giveaways

acf.post_copy:
WIN!
Spring Fling- Fashion Previews and Giveaways
March 17
10 a.m. – 4 p.m.
It’s time to go Spring shopping! Check out this season’s trends, colors, and key items to pick up!
Select Alexandria Mall stores previewing the biggest and best trends for Spring 2018. Stop by participating stores for a viewing and enter-to-win great prizes at each! Spring handbags, accessories, and store gift cards to be given away. $25 value prize at each participating store- enter to win them all! One store entry per person.
Hibbetts, Aeropostale, rue21, Versona, Lane Bryant, Bath & Body Works, and More!
